Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

– The Mo’Fo video: ollie by Guillaume Finck
– AntiHero Fridays: flip by Chris Pfanner
– Jart ‘The AM Project’: hardflip by Adrien Bulard
– Adidas welcome clip: 360flip by Pol Catena
– ‘Da Original’ part: b/s bigspin by Daniel Ledermann
– Mo’Fo ‘Lovestreet’: switch ollie by Joseph Biais
– Adidas ‘Away Days’: switch heelflip by Miles Silvas
– Kingpin Cover: switch f/s 180 by Youness Amrani
author: kev
